Identified Issue: Limited high-dimensional validation beyond 3D Negative-D models.
Resolution Plan: Extend Negative-D simulations to 4D, 5D, and higher dimensions for robustness testing.

Identified Issue: Lack of fully derived error estimates and spectral stability bounds.
Resolution Plan: Develop rigorous mathematical error bounds and stability criteria for Negative-D models.

Identified Issue: Pending collaborations for real-world Negative-D quantum transport and plasma validation.
Resolution Plan: Initiate direct outreach to experimental physicists and plasma research groups.

Identified Issue: Need for expanded real-world deployment scenarios beyond current sectors.
Resolution Plan: Map Negative-D applications into emerging fields like AI physics modeling and high-energy astrophysics.

Identified Issue: Potential improvements in Negative-D solver performance using AI and neural operators.
Resolution Plan: Investigate physics-informed neural networks (PINNs) and transformer-based PDE solvers.
